sect1.title: SumAggregator
sect1.subtitle: A component used for calculating sums from numerical data.

sect2.title: Component Description
sect2.para: This very simple component is used to calculate sums with attributes of the type Attribute.Double. In order to carry out this calculation for several values, the component with the attribute value takes an array of Attribute.Double-values and makes the sum values available in one array of Attribute.Double-values (attribute sum). Every time the component is called, the i-th element of value is added to the i-th element of sum. This component can be used, for example, in order to calculate the total area of a hydrological catchment area as a sum of the individual areas of all spatial model entities.
